page.title: 07CIVIL ENGINEERING: SHAWHEAD
page.content:
There are not a lot of businesses in a rural area. Mr Chalmers is a civil engineer who has a business: Chalmers Construction Ltd.
He drains fields and builds sewers and manholes out of concrete. He has 8 men and 3 can drive. His machinery is a JCB which is tracked and a JCB 3CT which is wheeled. He also has a tipping lorry, truck, transit van, dumper, car, cement mixer and a Portakabin for tea breaks.
If it takes more than an hour to get to the site they do not accept the job. Their only communication is two way VHF radios which are in the lorry, the van and at the base. It is hard to store supplies because their site is on agricultural land and they did not get planning permission for a yard.
